Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.validate

Root package for the Active Endpoints BPEL Deployment Validation code.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAePredeploymentValidator Perform validation on the IAeBprFile before attempting to create deployment objects.
IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler This interface defines methods that will be called by a validator when it is validating a resource (PDD, PDEF, etc...) file/document.
IAeValidationHandler Interface used by the deployment code.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractPddIterator Base class for validators that need to iterator over all pdd files in the bpr.
AeBpelLocationValidator  
AeCatalogValidator Validates that all of the wsdl entries in the catalog.xml (previously wsdlCatalog.xml) file are present in the bpr file.
AeDefaultValidationHandler The default validation handler for the system.
AeDeploymentFileValidator This class handles some very basic file contents validation for WSR and BPR deployments.
AeDeploymentValidator Validates process deployments.
AeDuplicateServiceNameValidator Validates that same service name is not used twice (by two diff myRole elements) within a BPR file.
AeDuplicateServiceNameValidator.AeDeploymentTuple simple struct, service name, process qname, and pdd name
AePartnerLinkValidator Issue warnings if that any partner links defined in the bpel are not defined in the process deployment descriptor.
AePddInfo Wraps the process deployment descriptor xml for validation.
AePddValidator Schema+ validation of pdd files.
AePdefValidator Schema+ validation of pdef files.
AePersistentTypeDeploymentValidator A deployment validator that checks to see if the deploypment persistence and transaction type is non-default, then verifies that only permitted BPEL constructs are included; as well as to verify that subprocess invokes are not used.
AePredeploymentValidator The top level predeployment validator.
AeProcessNameMatchValidator Ensure that the process name in the pdd its matching bpel file are the same.
AeResourceValidationErrorHandler This class implements an IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler that will delegate the reporting of the erorrs and warnings to a base error reporter.
AeSaxErrorRelayHandler This class is a SAX handler that will relay all SAX errors and warnings to an instance of IAePddValidationErrorHandler.
AeServiceQNameValidator Validate that the service QNames for static endpoint refs defined in the pdd files point to valid service names in the wsdl.
AeStaticEndpointReferenceValidator Emit a warning for static endpoint references with service names if we can't find a matching port in the catalog.
AeWsdlCircRefValidator Validates that there are no circular references in the wsdl imports.
AeWsdlValidator Validates that the wsdl def we're working with doesn't contain any undefined messages.
 

Exception Summary
AeWsdlCircRefValidator.AeCircularRefException Exception for notification of circular reference in wsdl imports.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.validate Description

Root package for the Active Endpoints BPEL Deployment Validation code.

Provides classes to validate the BPR file and its process deployments.
